src_original: saṃgaṇikābhayabhītaḥ /  saṃsargabhayabhīto rāgadveṣamohabhayabhīto mānamadamrakṣaparidāhabhayabhīto lobhêrṣyāmātsaryabhayabhītaḥ rūpaśabdagandharasasparṣṭavyabhayabhītaḥ
tgt_original: 畏聚會習婬、怒、癡； 畏貢高、怒慢、害意於人； 畏於貪嫉； 畏於色、聲、香、味、細滑之念；

src_original: so 'haṃ*kāramamakārabhayabhītaḥ /  auddhatyavicikitsābhayabhītaḥ /  skandhamārabhayabhītaḥ /  kleśamārabhayabhīto /  mṛtyumārabhayabhīto /  devaputramārabhayabhītaḥ /
tgt_original: 畏於身魔、欲魔、罪魔、天魔；

src_original: anitye nityêti viparyāsabhayabhīto 'nātmany ātmêti viparyāsabhayabhīto 'śucau śucir iti viparyāsabhayabhīto /
tgt_original: 畏於非常為常想、畏於苦為樂想、畏無實為實想、畏無我有我想； 畏有吾我； 畏於狐疑、不正思想、猶豫、婬妷；
